==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Yuan Rong:''' Gather round, gather round! If you're passing by, don't pass this up: Introducing the amazing Shadow Lantern!
:{{DIcon|Wondrous}} I'll give it a go!
::'''Yuan Rong:''' No problem! I hope the Shadow Lantern shows you something truly spectacular.
:;(Opens Wondrous Shadows menu)
:{{DIcon}} What's this Shadow Lantern business?
::'''Yuan Rong:''' It's a simple new invention of mine &mdash; all you have to do is rotate the objects inside the Shadow Lantern, get all the shadows to merge in a certain way, and the most incredible images will be revealed before your very eyes.
::'''Yuan Rong:''' Intrigued? You should try it out for yourself! It's set up right here &mdash; please, peruse and use at your leisure.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Yuan Rong:''' Alright. If you've got the time, come back and give the Shadow Lantern a go!
{{Dialogue end}}
